channel.title: Just added dungeoneering to my source but i need help with something
channel.description: how would i make a code that would stop people from leaving the dung without taking off there items and putting them in there inventory bag and how would i make it when u leave dung it takes away ur items ?

item.title: Just added dungeoneering to my source but i need help with something
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

just add this to your leaveDung method or w.e you have that handles players leaving:

c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); //deletes all equipment/inv

Read full topic
item.source: Just added dungeoneering to my source but i need help with something
